comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Mackensen is the figure with the sword on the right

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: It is a detail of this photo: The officer between the Kaiser and v. Mackensen is Colonel Hans von Seeckt. (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hans_von_Seeckt) The archive title is: Ostfront.- Kaiser Wilhelm II. und Generalfeldmarschall August von Mackensen vor Gebäude mit Schild "Kaiserlich Deutsche Feldpostexpedition des Oberkommandos der 11. Armee"; nach dem 22. April 1915 see commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Bundesarchiv_Bild_183-R11...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Excellent catch! Translation of Bundesarchiv entry: "Eastern front.-Kaiser Wilhelm II and field marshal August von Mackensen in front of building with shield \"Imperial German Military mail expedition of the high command of the 11th Army\"; after April 22, 1915." Bundesarchiv does not identify von Seeckt in the photo. That seems to have been added to the Wikipedia file by another source. www.bild.bundesarchiv.de/cross-search/search/_1356177402/...[view]=detail&search[focus]=1
